item.description:
We're meeting at Dalat!! It's a tasty Vietnamese place with good prices and some yummy vegan options. This and every meetup lunch will also serve as a time to discuss ideas about local activism and what we are and can be doing to further help the animals, the environment etc in our community and beyond.

I forgot to mention that if you have any questions you can reach me at 508-410-3172.

See you all soon!!

Stephen
item.how_to_find_us: Dreads, glasses and a whole lot of veganess ;)
item.name: Worcester Vegan MeetUp & EatUp July Meeting
